title: New: Nouv Shy – Self
body:
Sweden’s **Nouv Shy** cropped up at the turn of the year with his beautiful debut track, [Past](http://admin.

crackintheroad.com/music/25790-new-nouv-shy-past-feat-gorgeous-gustroder), and has now followed it up with the equally majestic _Self._ Early days, yet another indication of the talent this kid possesses, check out Self below.

excerpt.full: Sweden’s Nouv Shy cropped up at the turn of the year with his beautiful debut track, Past, and has now followed it up with the equally majestic Self. Early days, yet another indication of the talent this kid possesses, check out Self below.
